des: "Delicious and easy, this is a fabulous mix of berries and yogurt! If you like, you can make a thin layer of graham crackers or granola in each vanilla/berry layer. That gives it a little more crunch."
ins: Cover the bottoms of two small glasses with a layer of yogurt.  Cover layer with berries.  Repeat until both glasses are full, ending with a fruit layer.  Sprinkle with graham crackers and nutmeg.
